data.title: Bureau of Cannabis Control Announces Weekly Reports
data.excerpt:
To All BCC Interested Parties:
The Bureau of Cannabis Control has announced the addition of a new weekly report listing licensee information. This report reflects recently issued licenses, denied applications, and cannabis batch testing results.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
